title: Exodus  (Action Drama 1960)  Excellent quality in a thimble!
description:
Description
Attn: Bob

The screenshots are included merely to provide the average viewer with a means to determine the quality of the movie they were taken from and, thereby, help them to decide whether or not to download the movie. The screenshots can be previewed at Kickasstorrents under the same torrent title.

A sample of the movie is included with that same purpose in mind. 

Storyline

The theme is the founding of the state of Israel. The action begins on a ship filled with Jewish immigrants bound for Israel who are being off loaded on Cyprus. An Intelligence officer succeeds in getting them back on board their ship only to have the harbor blocked by the British with whom they must negotiate. The second part of the film is about the situation in Israel as independence is declared and most of their neighbors attack them.
